Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Action.A_PhaseWalk
Section.SkillDescription: Gain the ability to turn invisible and move incredibly fast. Upon entering and leaving Phasewalk you create a Phase Blast that damages nearby enemies. You can Melee attack to end Phasewalk early.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Action.PhaseWalk_meleeCancel
Section.SkillDescription: Using a melee attack while Phasewalking deals additional damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.CorrosiveReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes a corrosive explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.ExplosiveReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes an explosive entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.IncendiaryReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes an incindiary explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.ShockingReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes a shock explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Adrenaline.Adrenaline_Lilith
Section.SkillDescription: Roland gains adrenaline when he damages enemies or if one of his friends gets crippled.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Blackout
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of Phasewalk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Blackout_activated
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of Phasewalk

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Enforcer
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your accuracy and Bullet Damage for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.HighVelocity
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Bullet Damage and Velocity.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.HitAndRun
Section.SkillDescription: Gain increased melee damage and Phasewalk duration.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.PhaseStrike
Section.SkillDescription: Using a melee attack while Phasewalking deals additional damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.SilentResolve
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to damage for a few seconds after Phasewalking.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.SilentResolve_active
Section.SkillDescription: Gain resistance to all damage for 6 seconds after Phasewalking.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Slayer
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Critical Hit Damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.Diva
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the Capacity of your shield.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.DramaticEntrance
Section.SkillDescription: Your Phase Blast can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.DramaticEntrance_active
Section.SkillDescription: When Phasewalk ends you cause an explosion that can Slow nearby enemies.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.GirlPower
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy causes your Shield to quickly regenerate for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.HardToGet
Section.SkillDescription: Decreases the Cooldown of Phasewalk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.InnerGlow
Section.SkillDescription: While Phasewalking you regenerate Health.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.MindGames
Section.SkillDescription: Each bullet you fire has a chance to Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.Striking
Section.SkillDescription: Your melee attacks can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Intuition
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your movement speed and the experience you and your team earn for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Phoenix
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy causes you to deal Fire Damage to nearby enemies and makes your shots not always cost ammo for a few seconds. The Fire Damage increases with your Level.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Quicksilver
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Fire Rate with all weapons.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Radiance
Section.SkillDescription: You deal Shock Damage to nearby enemies while Phasewalking. Damage is based on your Level and the Skill's Level.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Resilience
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to Fire, Shock, Corrosive, and Explosive Damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.spark
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your chance of causing Elemental Effects with Elemental Weapons.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Venom
Section.SkillDescription: Adds Corrosive Damage to your melee attacks. Also, your melee attacks have a chance to Corrode enemies, causing additional damage over time.
